c74object.name: pdm.scale.xpose

inlet.description: Input MIDI note number (0-127) to be transposed by scale degrees.
Number of scale degrees to transpose the input note. Can be positive or negative.

outlet.description: The transposed MIDI note number, fitted to the scale and transposed by the specified number of scale degrees.

objarg.name: root_note
objarg.digest: Set the root note of the scale
objarg.description: Sets the root note of the scale (0-11, where 0=C, 1=C#, 2=D, etc.). Defaults to 0 (C).

c74object.description: Transposes MIDI notes by scale degrees (diatonic transposition). The object first fits the input note to the current scale, then transposes it by the specified number of scale degrees. The transposition respects the scale structure and automatically handles octave wrapping. The object uses a buffer named "intervals" containing the scale intervals in semitones from the root note.
c74object.digest: Transpose MIDI notes by scale degrees.
